app.common.name: toolbox (version {{.Version}})
app.common.license: Licensed under MIT License. See https://github.com/watermint/toolbox for more detail
app.common.flag.secure: Do not store tokens into a file
app.common.flag.lang: Display language (specify with BCP47 format, like `en` or `ja-JP`)
app.common.diag.network.err.unreachable:
Network unreachable to `{{.Url}}`.
Please ensure your network connection or proxy configuration.
Please specify `-proxy` option if your machine is under proxy or firewall.

Error:
{{.Error}}
auth.basic.oauth_seq1:
1. Visit the URL for the auth dialog:

{{.Url}}

2. Click 'Allow' (you might have to login first):
3. Copy the authorisation code:
auth.basic.generated_token1:
1. Visit the MyApp page (you might have to login first):

https://www.dropbox.com/developers/apps

2. Proceed with "Create App"
3. Choose "{{.API}}"
4. Choose "{{.TypeOfAccess}}"
5. Enter name of your app
6. Proceed with "Create App"
7. Hit "Generate" button near "Generated access token"
8. Copy generated token
auth.basic.verify.failed: Unable to verify token, or invalid token. Please retry

{{.Command}} COMMAND

Available commands:

cmd.team.device.unlink.usage:
unlink command use JSON report of `team device list` command

{{.Command}} team device list -device (mobile|web|desktop) | {{.Command}} -stdin
{{.Command}} -file filename.json
cmd.team.device.unlink.flag.file: Read data from a file. Please specify path to the file.
cmd.team.device.unlink.flag.delete_on_un: Whether to delete all files of the account (this is possible only if supported by the desktop client and will be made the next time the client access the account)

cmd.team.teamfolder.mirror.err.not_enoug: Params `-src-account` and `-dest-account` are required. Please specify options
No team folders are specified. Please provide team folder names as an argument, or specify `-all` option.

Preparing "source account" ({{.Alias}} Management token; Please proceed authentication with the "source account" if you asked authentication.

Team admin of "to account" {{.Alias}}: TeamMemberId:{{.TeamMemberId}}, Email:{{.Email}}
